response.original_title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Voting Rights - Catherine Cretu
response.overview: A woman growing up in Washington, DC was outraged to learn that her parents could not vote. As an adult, she knows the right to vote cannot be taken for granted.
response.tagline: A woman growing up in Washington, DC was outraged to learn that her parents could not vote.
response.title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Voting Rights - Catherine Cretu
